items.title: 101 Starships
items.description: Can you destroy this huge fleet and survive? A difficult shoot 'em up with interesting scoring mechanics. (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Zoglu

items.description: A 1010 block puzzle game
items.author: Mike Meyer (mwm)

items.description:
A version of the classic WWII game 1943: The Battle of Midway. Destroy the enemy Zeroes and Bombers. Zeros with solid wings will die on one shot, others will take multiple hits before they die. Watch your fuel, your health and ammunition - replenish these by running over the power ups!

Keys

During play: D-Pad controls the plane, A to shoot and B to roll the plane and avoid enemy bullets.
Introduction: B to toggle sound, Up or Down to change levels, Left or Right to see credits.
Game Over: Up and Down to reset scores.

Level 1 is capped at 30 games.
Level 2 is capped at 60 games.
Level 3 goes forever!
items.author: Simon Holmes (filmote)

items.description: 2048 Clone
items.author: Yuki

items.title: ABAsm DP1
items.description: ABasm is an Arduboy game that lets you program your own Arduboy games, on your Arduboy! It uses an assembly language-style of programming with its own bytecode format.
items.author: fuopy

items.title: Abshell
items.description: Abshell is a command shell for Arduboy. You can send commands from PC to Arduboy via USB-serial port. No programming skills needed to draw graphics on Arduboy screen !
items.author: boochow

items.title: abSynth FM
items.description: FM Synthesizer with step sequencer
items.author: boochow

items.title: APara
items.description: Catch the poor paratroopers before they fall into the shark infested sea.
items.author: leovt

items.title: Arcodia
items.description: A port of the classic ZX Spectrum game 'Arcadia'.
items.author: Mike McRoberts (TheArduinoGuy)

items.title: Ard-Drivin
items.description: a little racing game for the good old arduboy.
items.author: Rem and LP

items.title: Ardletics
items.description: Athletics game for Arduboy. At the moment I have a playable proof of concept of what would be the basis of the game (including smooth animations and digitized sound).
items.author: Ignacio ViÃ±a (igvina)

items.title: Ardu Buggy
items.description: Ardu Buggy, inspired by Moon Patrol.
items.author: NonoNano

items.title: Ardu-man
items.description: Re-live the nostalgic glory of games like Pac-Man and Lock 'n' Chase (with a few less pixels...) right on your Arduboy!
items.author: Seth Robinson

items.title: Ardu-Whack
items.description: Whack them all to make the highest score!
items.author: zeduckmaster

items.title: ArduBall
items.description: sort of 1 v 1 basketball game between you and the cpu that is fairly difficult.
items.author: 2BarrelShotgun

items.title: Arduboy Assistant
items.description: Arduboy Assistant allows you to view raw EEPROM data, back it up through the Arduino IDE's serial monitor, restore EEPROM data the same way, and even clear the entirety of the EEPROM data. Additionally, you can also test buttons, LED's, speaker, serial port, and screen.
items.author: crait

items.title: Arduboy Gamepad
items.description: Maps Arduboy buttons to keyboard keys
items.author: fuopy

items.title: Arduboy Says
items.description: The game is simple. Remember and repeat the sequences as they show on screen. There are twenty levels generated randomly, so the game should be replayable. The random generation isn't quite working perfectly, sometimes sequences repeat through the same levels (ie, level 1 is almost always Left then Right).
items.author: Slade1972

items.title: ArduBOYNG
items.description: a simple PONG inspired game by an Arduboy noob
items.author: Troubadixx

items.title: Arducross
items.description: Very simple, very early Picross clone. Currently has 16 boards, some of which are from Mario's Picross for the Gameboy.
items.author: David (oldmouse123)

items.title: ArduIndy
items.description: Inspired by ZX Spectrum game 'Sabre Wulf'. An action game where you shall find 4 keys in the dungeons. After finding the 4 keys, the door to freedom opens. Beware of the skull monster, you can only kill it if you have found potion. From version 2.5 it is possible to save progress in the game and start again from where you were later on.
items.author: JacosteCode

items.title: Ardulem
items.description: Ardulem is an attempt to bring the legendary "Lemmings" game to the Arduboy platform
items.author: banban

items.title: Arduloop
items.description: A little chiptune step sequencer
items.author: possan

items.title: Arduminer
items.description: Mining, crafting and combat on your arduboy. Explore 64 procedurally generated levels, conquer dungeons and upgrade your kit to survive progressively stronger enemies.
items.author: Bergasms

items.title: ArduRemote
items.description: Virtual mouse and keyboard for Arduboy
items.author: eried

items.title: Arduslide
items.description: simple tile slide game
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Ardusweeper
items.description: A simple minesweeper for arduboy
items.author: Julien Bellue

items.title: Armageddon
items.description: You have been tasked with the defense of six cities from the incoming nuclear apocalypse. You have only two launchers to shoot down incoming missiles. Survive as long as you can to delay the inevitable end of the world. (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: ARtillery
items.description: An Arduboy game inspired by Amiga Tanx by Gary Roberts.
items.author: bergasms

items.title: Atomic Puzzle Pack
items.description: Atomic Puzzle Pack 3-in-1 game for Arduboy
items.author: atomic-salamander

items.title: Back to the Jungle
items.description: The Zoo had to close, what can the animals do? Entry game for the first Arduboy Game Jam.
items.author: eried

items.title: Bang! Bang!
items.description: GameBuino implementation of the Bang! Bang! game. (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Bangi
items.description: Destroy all the balloons - 45 challenging levels
items.author: Ignacio ViÃ±a (igvina)

items.title: Battle For Zuthsrah
items.description: 8 bit space shooter designed for Arduboy gaming system
items.author: Mre64

items.title: BigBlackBox
items.description: A awesome platformer for an awesome console! With the gameplay style of SuperMeatBoy, BigBlackBox is a fun platformer full a challenging level desing with a beautiful and handsome look! (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: STUDIOCRAFTapps

items.title: Blocks
items.description: Move boxes around until they're where they belong.
items.author: w3woody

items.title: Boids
items.description: Flocking behavior simulator, depicting flocking birds, shoaling fish or swarming bees
items.author: elpassion

items.title: Bombzzle
items.description: Bombzzle is a puzzle game where you must blow up chains of similar blocks to get points! Every 10 seconds, a bomb appears along with a tile marked as BONUS (+) and another as PENALTY (-). Bonus tiles worth 1 point while penalty tiles make you lose 1 point per level! Every 50 points, you level up.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Boris goes skiing
items.description: A clone of the ZX Spectrum game Horace goes skiing for the Arduboy
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Bounce
items.description: 2 Player Game. A paddle and ball game in the vein on Atari's Pong. Two dogs are trying to hit the ball back and forth without the ball going past them. If the ball does go past them, that is a point for the other dog. The dog with the highest score when the player(s) stop, wins.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Box Stacker
items.description: Stacker clone like the game at the arcade that gives you a chance to win a prize, however in this one the only thing you win is satisfaction!.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Breakout-V
items.description: Simple vertical screen version of Breakout for Arduboy.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: BurgardTime
items.description: Just a little homage to the classic BurgerTime.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Cascade Path
items.description: Have you ever wanted to discover what life was like on the trail? Going hunting and fording rivers? Have you ever wanted to know more about Dysentery than you could possibly imagine?
items.author: batesle

items.title: CastleBoy
items.description: Castlevania-like game for the Arduboy.
items.author: jlauener

items.title: Chicken Launcher
items.description: Chicken Launcher is a fun lil' game I made based off of Kitten Cannon. Shoot a chicken as far as you can, trying to hit springboards to give you a boost, but watch out for spikes! Your high score is recorded and saved. If you think you get a big high score, tweet me a pic!
items.author: crait

items.title: Chri-Bocchi Cat
items.description: Move the cat and bounce gift boxes for 2 minutes.
items.author: obono

items.title: Chrome Dino
items.description: I've recreated Chrome's (in?)famous dino side-scroller running-man-style dino jumper. It's just a quick hack, certainly unfinished and unoptimized but you might enjoy it.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Chrome Dino - Halloween
items.description: Enjoy this special spooked-up edition of Chrome Dino
items.author: Unknown

items.title: CosmicPods
items.description: CosmicPods is a tiny shoot-'em-up game for Arduboy. As cosmic squid, shoot octopuses up!
items.author: Unknown

items.title: CowBro
items.description: You are a cowboy and have to shoot randomly generated targets and grab time bonuses that drop from the top of the stage to continue.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Crabator
items.description: Crabator is an intense action game where you kill crabs to make money to buy weapons to kill crabs to make money, etc. but watch out, the more crabs you kill the more they are. (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Aurelien Rodot

items.title: Crates 3D
items.description: A port of the TI-83 calculator puzzle game.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: CrazyKart
items.description: Basic game to test capabilities and frameworks
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Cripple Mr Onion!
items.description: It's a like a hilariously complicated combination of poker and blackjack, using an 8-suited deck. You can customize your character, accumulate money through betting, etc. As you gain money, your 'rank' increases, with the ultimate goal of being rich enough to become the Patrician of Ankh-Morpork!
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Cute E
items.description: Quick time event game for the Arduboy, inspired by the singer Els Pynoo and the song "You can sleep in my bed" from Vive la fête. It was coded by Juice Lizard in 2017.
items.author: JuiceLizard

items.title: DanceRow
items.description: Dance with your Arduboy on DanceRow. With your keypad's arrow, match the arrow on the screen. You'll got points based on how close you dance to the beat :)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Dark & Under
items.description: Do you have what it takes to survive the depths of the Undermountain? Alone?  If so, then pack your gear, strap on your shield, explore labyrinthine corridors and battle unimaginable foes to steal the greedy Dragon's treasure.
items.author: Garage Collective (Cyril Guichard (Luxregina), Simon Holmes (Filmote), Pharap)

items.title: Deep Dish Nine
items.description: The goal of this game is to fly pizza delivery missions throughout the TRAPPIST-1 system in the alloted time (or the pizza is free!). This game utilizes the n-body simulation I developed for HANS, and actually requires you to use your knowledge of orbital mechanics to match orbits with your destination planet.
items.author: fentonc

items.title: Diamonds
items.description: Diamonds is a mix between a breakout game and a puzzle game. Original game was released on HP48 more than 20 years ago (yes.. Already 20 years...).
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Digger
items.description: Collect diamonds and avoid/kill monsters (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Do You Remember Love
items.description: Do You Remember Love? - a horizontally scrolling shooter
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Dominoes 'All Fives'
items.description: All Fives is a popular variant of Dominoes where players the goal of the game is not just to go out, but to make the open ends of the layout add up to 5 (or a multiple of five).
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Epic Mini Games!
items.description: This is a compilation of FUN mini games that I hope you will like. (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: MicroGames

items.title: Evade
items.description: A Space Shooter Game for Arduboy by Modus Create
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Fanboat
items.description: The greatest Swamp-Skimmer-Simulator ever conceived, unless you count Half-Life 2. That one's better.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Fatsche
items.description: defend the door!
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Fidget Spinner
items.description: A very simple fidget spinner simulator for Arduboy, as if there aren't enough fidget spinners already. You can spin the spinner clockwise or counter-clockwise, as well as change the design of the spinner.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Flappy Ball
items.description: Try to overcome the force of gravity and navigate a levitating ball through small openings.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Flood fill
items.description: This is a simple flood fill game for the Arduboy. Starting from the top-left tile, the goal is to flood the entire board until there is only one pattern.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Galaxion
items.description: Shooting game for Arduboy. Mission: Destroy aliens
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Game of Life
items.description:
This is a 25x25 Game of Life program for Arduboy.

KEYS
A: Game start
B: Put live cell
Direction Keys: Move cell
UP and DOWN: Reset
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Glove
items.description: Glove is an action-adventure game created in the style of the classic Gauntlet series. Navigate from room to room, blasting bad guys and collecting treasure along the way.
items.author: fuopy

items.title: Graph
items.description: A small graphing calculator for Arduboy! Very simple, though. More of a novelty than an actual calculator.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Harambe's Revenge
items.description: In Harambe's Revenge, you play as a phantasmal Harambe that has returned from the afterlife to convert oblivious tourists into mutant zombie gorilla minions which will then protect him. The zoo had to close down in quarantine, trapping many tourists inside. Harambe's path is a peaceful one so he has no actual attack. His specialty is the HARAMBE DASH - the ability to run faster that a speeding bullet. Press a button and Harambe's speed will temporarily increase. The RGB LED will shine YELLOW while Harambe is using his power. RED means his stamina is regenerating, and GREEN means he is ready to use another HARAMBE DASH.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Helii
items.description: A side-scrolling tunnel game
items.author: BHSPitMonkey

items.title: Hello, Commander
items.description: Turn-Based Strategy game for the Arduboy.
items.author: FManga

items.title: Hollow Seeker
items.description: Go forward in right direction. Seek a hollow as refuge not to be crushed.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Hopper
items.description: There are square panels around you. You must jump on them and go up (foreground side). If you miss the panel and fall toward bottom, the game is over.
items.author: obono

items.title: Humanity Revenge DC
items.description: It's a shoot 'em up quite hard, with 3 ship to choose from (different speed and weapons), 5 enemies with different characteristics, three big bosses, bomb and power-up, highscore and so on.
items.author: giangregorioc

items.title: IDOUDO
items.description: A Simon-like game by Rednuht. The game is opensource, in pure potato-chip assembly, available here: jumpstation.co.uk/dreamcast/idoudo.html (This game was adapted using an adapted version of Marcus Comstedt's SoftVMS emulator for Arduboy by FManga)
items.author: Rednuht, Comstedt, FManga

items.title: Invaders
items.description: Destroy all attacking invaders from space! Now with sound. (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Jet Pac
items.description: Arduboy clone of the classic ZX Spectrum game 'Jet Pac'.
items.author: Mike McRoberts

items.title: Jezzball
items.description: Isolate the bouncing balls (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: JumpBoy
items.description: Please twenty taken the coin. Floorboards will continue to decrease one by one each time you jump.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Kemono Patrol
items.description: You guide a battle bus over ditches, shoot away debris and enemies while your Japanese speaking assistant gives you tips.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Kooky Kookies
items.description: Santa has delivered the presents and filled the stockings. Help Santa eat the cookies before the kids wake up and discover him in this match 2 puzzle game. Build bigger sets to get extra time and lots of points
items.author: shdwwzrd

items.title: l4arduboy
items.description: i4arduboy is a horizontal shmup. Control a submarine and snipe far enemies on off-screen with torpedos! This is a porting from our windows work i-20000.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Leanna the Lion
items.description: I may be a lion, but I know what I like: I want fresh meat from my favorite restaurant. The zoo had to close
items.author: shdwwzrd

items.title: Lite Out
items.description: Lite/Out is a game where you have to turn off all of the lights, but every time you change a light, the surrounding lights change. The game consists of a 5-by-5 grid where some of the blocks are lit up. You'll complete the level when all of the blocks are not lit.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Little Rook Chess
items.description: Little Rook Chess is a chess program with a graphics front end. It was Originally developed as a demo application for my graphics library, U8glib13. Little Rook Chess is now part of U8g229, the latest version of my graphics lib.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: MayQ
items.description: Small RPG
items.author: Unknown

items.title: MazezaM
items.description: MazezaM is a puzzle game that was created by Malcolm Tyrrell for the ZX Spectrum in 2002. The game was released under the GNU Public License (GPL) and has since been ported to approximately 30 different platforms including the Commodore 64, Super Nintendo, and Android under the (incorrect) name Rote. The game is similar to Sokoban since the player is able to push (and not pull) boxes. One difference is that the boxes can only be pushed horizontally, and any push causes all of the boxes in that particular row to be moved. Another difference is that the player is only trying to exit the level as opposed to putting the boxes in the correct locations.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Mazogs
items.description: A port of the ZX-81 maze adventure game.
items.author: Brian

items.title: Metalog
items.description: A Logic simulator for the gamebuino (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: MicroCheckers
items.description: It's the standard game of checkers, also known as draughts.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Nanoseq
items.description: nano size sequencer for arduboy
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Night Raid
items.description: a Missile Command inspired game for Arduboy
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Ninja Fuzzgrawth
items.description: The Fuzzgrawth is the best ninja, he must ninja jump, slash, and fight his way to the top of the fabled three towers... there he will find the 'things'... collect all three things to be the one who has done that!
items.author: Hundstrasse

items.title: Nomis
items.description: A simple memory game similar to Simon(tm).
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Not Just a Hat Rack
items.description: Not Just a Hat Rack is a fast paced platformer for the Arduboy inspired by titles such as Super Meat Boy and Super House of Dead Ninjas. The aim is to complete the 40 rapidfire levels in the shortest time... There is no pause button
items.author: Hundstrasse

items.title: NumberMind
items.description: Master Mind type game with numbers for the Arduboy
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Oh, You're Gunna Die
items.description: This is a Bomberman-type game, but with a few changes. You'll have 10 seconds to reach the door safely, but try not touching anything or you'll die!
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Omega Horizon
items.description: The planet of Turnax has extensive mineral deposits of high value to the Interplanetary Allied Confederation (IPAC). Recent unanticipated attacks by primative species have proven damaging to mining operations. Your mission is to eliminate the primitive hierarchy in minimal time.
items.author: shdwwzrd

items.title: Paqman
items.description: Gobble all the dots in the maze and eat powerpills to catch the ghosts. Now with sound. (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Petit of the dead
items.description: 3d shooter using raycasting. Kill 100 enemies to survive
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Petitseq
items.description: petitseq is petit size sequencer for Arduboy
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Picovaders
items.description: picovaders is a space invaders-like shooting game for Arduboy.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Pipes
items.description: A version of the classic pipes game where you must lay pip between each pair of nodes without the pipes crossing each other. This version has puzzles ranging from 5 x 5 to 9 x 9.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Pocket Fighter
items.description: Pocket Fighter is an FTG, you can compete with your Arduboy. The CPU will repeat your actions at previous level.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Pocket Othello
items.description: Pocket Othello is an Othello game for the Arduboy in your pocket.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Pocket PDA
items.description: Pocket PDA is an OS for the Arduboy with some useful utilities, which turns your Arduboy into a PDA.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Poitto
items.description: The rules are simple: You try to go to the door. Avoid enemies, use switch blocks, spring blocks, and so on
items.author: inajob

items.title: Pong
items.description: A Pong clone for the Arduboy
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Poop Panic!
items.description: You keep the zoo clean!
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Quadrastic
items.description: Quadrastic a simple addicting game based off a favorite psp homebrew game called Squarez.
items.author: dragula96

items.title: Rayne the Rogue
items.description: As a child Rayne watched the rich from the streets of the village and burned with jealousy. After years and years of poverty an idea formed. Rayne has decided to sneak into the lairs of dragons and steel their treasures. Rayne need your help to navigate the dangerous caves and avoid the dragon's breath to become the wealthiest person in the village, but take heed, the further Rayne gets the more treacherous it will be.
items.author: shdwwzrd

items.title: Rick and Morty Game
items.description: The most epic unofficial Rick and Morty game
items.author: Celinebins

items.title: Ring Puzzle
items.description: Puzzle game using toroidal topology.
items.author: Skuratovich Sergey

items.title: RoboDodge
items.description: Here is RoboDodge! The game where you control your very own small robot as you dodge the barrage of incoming rockets!
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Roo Run
items.description: The zoo had to close and now all the animals are trying to escape! Help the kangaroo run away from the animal control who's trying to catch him. Push A and B back and forth as fast as you can to run faster. This game was created for the first Arduboy Game Jam. ! Your high score will be recorded and saved.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Santa's Happy Little Packer
items.description: Santa needs help, he has a lot of gifts in weird layout and you need to fit them in his sleigh filling all the spaces.
items.author: eried

items.title: Sensitive
items.description: Arduboy remake (demake?) of the C64 game Sensitive by Oliver Kirwa.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: SetNameAndID
items.description: Manage an Arduboy's unit name and ID stored in the system EEPROM area
items.author: Unknown

items.title: SFCave
items.description: A port of Stephanie Mak's SFCave: This is a game I used to enjoy back in the Palm Pilot days. It's a really simple game, uses only a single pushbutton to control the action. You're 'flying' through a cave and you can only control your altitude - press the button to go up, release the button to go down. The object is not to crash into the ceiling or floor.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: SFZ
items.description: Tiny third person perspective shooter
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Siege
items.description: The king needs your help to keep the Dark Lord's army from destroying the kingdom. The Wizards will arrive after the 5th day and the rest of our army will be back in 20 days. The king is counting on you to hold the wall. Hold strong, noble archer, HOLD STRONG!
items.author: shdwwzrd

items.title: SkateArdDie!
items.description: Just a little skateboarding game for the arduboy
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Sketch-A-Sketch
items.description: Sketch-A-Sketch is a simple drawing program ala Etch-A-Sketch.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Snake
items.description: A Snake game by Stu. Any other information on it seems to have bitrotted away completely. (This game was adapted using an adapted version of Marcus Comstedt's SoftVMS emulator for Arduboy by FManga)
items.author: Stu, Comstedt, FManga

items.title: snELk
items.description: SnELk is clone of Snake from Nokia 3210 written in C++ on Arduboy
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Solitaire
items.description: Klondike solitaire (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Space Fighter
items.description: A game similar to Stellar Impact but not as finished and nice as Stellar Impact.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Space Invaders
items.description: Another game by Rednuht. Assembly source, lore, VMS files, etc: http://jumpstation.co.uk/si/si.html
items.author: Rednuht

items.title: Space Knife
items.description: Work In Progress of a Gradius-Like Shooter for the Arduboy gaming device.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Squario
items.description: Here is is the jumping square man adventure you've all been looking for!
items.author: bateske

items.title: Star Honor
items.description: Star Honor is a Roguelike space adventure where you are field promoted into the Captain's chair of the USS Arduino. Your home world has become the victim of the a biological weapon deployed by enemies. You posses the only hope for your world, a cure for the phage. With a skeleton crew, a limping vessel and time running out, you must travel world to world, seeing supplies, upgrades and doing battle to make it home and save your planet.
items.author: Wenceslao Villanueva Jr

items.title: Stellar Impact
items.description: It's a simple shmup, but it has lots of stuff I think is pretty neat, like procgen starfields, a bomb that freezes time, a nice title screen, eeprom saving and more.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Sudoku-NBP
items.description: Play Sudoku on your Arduboy. Includes 45 puzzles (easy, medium, hard) and allows custom puzzles to be entered manually or via serial input. Four players or puzzles can be save and restored from non-volatile memory (EEPROM).
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Techno Monkey
items.description:
A meteor crashes in a zoo during the night.

An alien virus spreads to the residents in the zoo and causes them to mutate into
robot hybrids called Technoids.

Do to the outbreak, the zoo has been under quarantine.

It is a fight for survival inside.
Can you beat the opposing Technoids and survive?
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Tetris
items.description: By Marcus Comstedt. After he wrote the assembler and reverse-engineered the hardware, he released this as a tutorial on making games for the VMU (This game was adapted using an adapted version of Marcus Comstedt's SoftVMS emulator for Arduboy by FManga)
items.author: Comstedt, FManga

items.title: The Bounce
items.description: The Bounce is a bouncy ball physics platformer game. Simple to understand yet incredibly hard to master, what seems easy at first glance is actually pretty rage inducing when you get to the later levels. I'm not much of an artist so I focused on simple design, which allows for easily customisable levels (maybe a level editor someday) and awesome gameplay.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: The guy who never complains
items.description:
A funny ebook on Arduboy.

The guy who never complains by Juice Lizard, 2016-2017. 32 chapters, 15 minutes of pure positive attitude.

A: next page B: previous page
items.author: Unknown

items.title: TicTacCurly
items.description: tic tac toe game for arduboy 1-2 player
items.author: curly

items.title: Tiny Asteroids
items.description: Asteroids(1979) clone.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Tiny Depth
items.description: tiny depth is SuperDepth(1991) stage1 clone.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Tiny Digital Invader
items.description: Tiny Digital Invader is Casio MG-880 Calculator(1980) game clone. This game use only 8 * 7-segment display.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Tiny NS-Tower
items.description: player climb tower. goal is 30 floor.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Tiny Sokoban
items.description: Tiny Sokoban is Sokoban(1982) clone. It use Yoshio Murase Levels. These levels are very small (no more than 8x8). But difficult and interesting.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: To
items.description: You are the developer of the door with the teleport function. But just before completion, someone is trying to destroy the door. There seems to be no choice but to distort the space with the power of the door and to prevent destruction.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Toyoshiki Tiny Basic
items.description: Toyoshiki Tiny Basic is a Tiny BASIC interpreter that receives input from a serial device connected via USB. Note that a serial monitor program, such as Tera Term, is required to use this application.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Train Dodge
items.description: Who's brave enough to play chicken with a train? Stand on the track as multiple trains come at you full-speed... The closer they get to you before jumping off the tracks, the more points you'll rack up. (You'll also lose points for jumping off of the track too early.) Dodge as many as you can, but beware! If you don't jump off in time, you'll be hit!
items.author: crait

items.title: Tres
items.description: Clone/Port/Rip-off of the game Threes! for mobile phones
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Tris
items.description: Like Tetris, but not copyrighted
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Ufo-Race
items.description: A fast paced racing game where you have to finish a lap as fast as possible while avoiding obstacles. (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Umeroose
items.description: Super simple game. Fill the holes and do not fall
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Virtual Gamepad
items.description: Simple USB HID Gamepad. Emulates a normal gamepad with 4 buttons and directional pad.
items.author: eried

items.title: WHG
items.description: This is a Gamebuino port of the browsergame Worlds Hardest Game. Featuring 22 levels this game will surely seem to be next to impossible! I am not responsible for any damage to your Gamebuino that you do due to the frustration when trying to beat this game. (This game was adapted using the Gamebuino Library for Arduboy by akkera102)
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Wire Screensaver
items.description: Simple demo showing a Morie type pattern thing.
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Yatzy
items.description: The classic dice game is now available for the ARDUBOY! Play Solo or play with up to two friends with pass and play.
items.author: shdwwzrd

items.title: YouWontSurvive
items.description: Avoid incoming enemies on two different modes and test your reflexes. Move your character by pressing UP and DOWN. Sounds easy right? But remember ...surviving is hard in this one. Get at least 30 points! Good luck and happy gaming!
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Zoo
items.description: ZooKeeper Clone
items.author: Unknown

items.title: Zoo at Midnight
items.description: The zoo had to close, but the keepers had forgotten to feed the animals, now it's up to Scrawf to find them food and feed them without being caught in the zoo warden's flashlights! Guide Scrawf through, what can only be described as, the world's most warden heavy zoo and hedge-maze. Slip past the wardens and avoid their flashlights to find the three different types of food to feed the Lion, Zebra, and Elephant. Finally, once all the animals are fed and sleepy, escape from the zoo!
items.author: Unknown

items.title: ZooEscape
items.description: Entry for the Arduboy Jam May 2017. Instructions: Escape from animals as long as you can. Jump over Crocodile. Run when Rhino charges. Jump the small animals on the ground.
items.author: Unknown
